original_title: Kelly the Coed 15: PiPi Girls Rule!
overview: Get set America, 'cause there's a new Kelly on campus and she's as naughty a slut as we could find! Meet Crystal Ray as everyone's favorite slutty coed, Kelly. It would seem that the double penetration sensation is sweeping the campus and every Pi Pi sorority girl is doing it!
title: Kelly the Coed 15: PiPi Girls Rule!
